present.english: The loving mother sends the special gift
The good friends send the new book

imperfect.english: I was sending the long letter
The loving mother was sending the special gift
The good friends were sending the new book

future.english: I will send the long letter
The loving mother will send the special gift
The good friends will send the new book

aorist.english: The loving mother sent the special gift
The good friends sent the new book

optative.english: I should send the long letter

optative.georgian: მოსიყვარულე დედამ განსაკუთრებული საჩუქარი უნდა გაგზავნოს
optative.english: The loving mother should send the special gift

optative.georgian: კარგმა მეგობრებმა ახალი წიგნი უნდა გაგზავნონ
optative.english: The good friends should send the new book

imperative.english: You all (you formal), send the important message
